item.title: 道达尔能源与法国初创公司 Mistral 建立人工智能合作伙伴关系
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）和法国初创公司 Mistral 周四表示，双方将合作推动人工智能（AI）的应用。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies and French startup Mistral will partner to boost the application of artificial intelligence (AI), the two companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: Besi 公司上调预期，预计对其先进解决方案的需求将增加
item.description: 荷兰半导体公司 Besi 在投资者日活动中上调了 2025 年的财务目标，因为该公司预计对其先进封装解决方案的需求将会增加。【原文：Dutch semiconductor company Besi raised its 2025 financial targets amid its investor day as it expects higher demand for its advanced packaging solutions.】

item.title: 贝莱德举办投资者日，推动私人市场发展成焦点
item.description: 贝莱德将于周四举行投资者日活动，预计将让投资者深入了解这家资产管理公司的战略重点及其对私募市场日益增长的关注。【原文：BlackRock will hold an investor day on Thursday that is expected to provide insight into the asset management firm's strategic priorities and its growing focus on private markets.】

item.title: 随着全球动荡加剧，英国公司的稳定性和低价吸引着交易者
item.description: 根据 Dealogic 的数据，本周一是今年最繁忙的一天，公布的对英国公司的出价超过 100 亿美元，这表明低估值和市场的相对稳定在波动引起的停顿之后正在吸引竞争对手和资金。【原文：More than $10 billion in bids for British companies announced on Monday, this year's busiest day according to Dealogic data, showed how low valuations and the market's relative stability were attracting rivals and funds after a volatility-induced pause.】

item.title: 政府称有关 UPI 交易费的报道不实，印度 Paytm 公司业绩下滑
item.description: 周四，数字支付公司 Paytm 股价暴跌达 10%，此前印度财政部表示，有关对流行的统一支付接口（UPI）交易收取费用的报道是虚假的，毫无根据。【原文：Shares of digital payments firm Paytm slumped as much as 10% on Thursday after India's finance ministry said that reports about the introduction of fees on the popular unified payments interface (UPI) transactions were false and baseless.】

item.title: 早间新闻中美贸易休战未见缓解
item.description: Johann M Cherian 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Johann M Cherian】

item.title: 独家报道中国支持的民兵确保了缅甸新稀土矿的控制权
item.description: 据四位熟知内情的人士透露，一支由中国支持的民兵正在保护缅甸东部新的稀土矿，中国政府正采取行动确保对这些矿产的控制权，并将其作为在与华盛顿的贸易战中讨价还价的筹码。【原文：A Chinese-backed militia is protecting new rare earth mines in eastern Myanmar, according to four people familiar with the matter, as Beijing moves to secure control of the minerals it is wielding as a bargaining chip in its trade war with Washington.】

item.title: 空中客车公司首席执行官称，尽管出现延误，但仍能实现交付目标
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）核心飞机制造业务首席执行官表示，尽管瓶颈问题导致近40架已完工的机身停在工厂等待发动机，但该公司仍对实现2025年交付820架飞机的目标抱有 "谨慎的希望"。【原文：Airbus is "cautiously hopeful" that it can meet a 2025 target of 820 deliveries despite bottlenecks that have left nearly 40 completed airframes parked at its factories waiting for engines, the CEO of its core planemaking business said.】

item.title: 尽管贸易关系紧张，空中客车公司上调 20 年喷气机需求预测
item.description: 周四，空中客车公司（Airbus）上调了对未来20年飞机需求的预测，并告诉投资者和供应商，航空运输业有望渡过当前的贸易紧张浪潮。【原文：Airbus revised up its forecast for airplane demand over the next 20 years on Thursday, telling investors and suppliers the air transport industry was expected to ride out the current wave of trade tensions.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Bunge 公司以 82 亿美元并购 Viterra 公司的交易接近中国裁决
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，美国谷物贸易商邦吉公司（Bunge）以82亿美元收购嘉能可（Glencore）支持的维泰拉公司（Viterra）的交易即将得到中国监管机构的裁决，预计几天内就会有结果。【原文：U.S. grains merchant Bunge is close to getting a ruling from Chinese regulators on its $8.2 billion purchase of Glencore-backed Viterra with a verdict expected within days, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易和地缘政治紧张局势拖累股市下滑，美元下跌
item.description: 周四，全球股市和美元下滑，原因是投资者对美国一份良性通胀报告和华盛顿与北京之间脆弱的贸易休战进行了评估，而中东日益加剧的紧张局势和挥之不去的关税忧虑则削弱了风险情绪。【原文：Global stocks and the dollar slipped on Thursday as investors sized up a benign U.S. inflation report and the fragile trade truce between Washington and Beijing, while rising tensions in the Middle East and lingering tariff anxiety dented risk sentiment.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，美联储预期升温，美元下滑
item.description: 由于有进一步迹象表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普可能会在关税谈判中采取更柔和的立场，以及对美联储降息的预期升温，美元周四出现下滑。【原文：The dollar slid on Thursday on further signs that U.S. President Donald Trump may adopt a softer stance in tariff negotiations and heightened expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 因担心美伊紧张局势升级，油价上扬
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示美军人员正在撤离中东之后，油价周四走高至两个多月以来的最高点，这引发了人们对与伊朗紧张局势升级可能扰乱供应的担忧。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Thursday to their highest in more than two months, after U.S. President Donald Trump said U.S. personnel were being moved out of the Middle East, which raised fear that escalating tensions with Iran could disrupt supply.】

item.title: 台湾网络单位称不会被中国的悬赏吓倒
item.description: 台湾国防部表示，台湾的网络部队不会被中国威胁悬赏逮捕北京称是台湾军事黑客的 20 人所吓倒，中国的法律体系对台湾没有管辖权。【原文：Taiwan's cyber forces will not be intimidated by China's threats of a bounty for the arrest of 20 people Beijing says are Taiwanese military hackers, and China's legal system has no jurisdiction on the island, its defence ministry said.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 已讨论过从沙特阿拉伯和印度投资者处筹集资金的问题
item.description: The Information》周三援引熟悉融资情况的人士的话报道称，OpenAI 已与沙特 PIF、印度企业集团 Reliance Industries 和现有股东阿拉伯联合酋长国 MGX 就其 400 亿美元的融资进行了洽谈。【原文：OpenAI has talked to Saudi's PIF, Indian conglomerate Reliance Industries and existing shareholder United Arab Emirates' MGX about its $40 billion financing, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the fundraise.】

item.title: 美国监管机构在最后一刻推迟实施私募基金报告新规
item.description: 美国监管机构周三慌忙延长了私募基金投资顾问新数据报告要求的最后期限，而此时距离新要求生效仅有一天时间。【原文：U.S. regulators scrambled on Wednesday to extend a deadline for new data reporting requirements for investment advisers to private funds, just one day before they were due to take effect.】

item.title: 丰田董事长将在股东大会上就 330 亿美元交易接受审查
item.description: 丰田汽车董事长丰田章男可能会在周四召开的股东大会上，因一项价值 330 亿美元的重要供应商私有化交易而受到审查。【原文：Toyota Motor Chairman Akio Toyoda is likely to face scrutiny over a $33 billion take-private deal of a key supplier when shareholders assemble for the Japanese automaker's annual general meeting on Thursday.】

item.title: Chime 在美国的首次公开募股定价为每股 27 美元，募集资金 8.64 亿美元
item.description: Chime 周三表示，该公司在美国首次公开发行股票，每股定价 27 美元，共募集资金 8.64 亿美元。【原文：Chime said on Wednesday it had raised $864 million in its U.S. initial public offering after pricing shares at $27 each.】

item.title: BLET 工会成员投票批准与 CSX 签订的 5 年协议
item.description: 铁路运营商 CSX 周三表示，机车工程师和列车员兄弟会（BLET）所代表的员工已投票批准了为期五年的集体谈判协议。【原文：Railroad operator CSX said on Wednesday that employees represented by the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers and Trainmen (BLET) have voted to ratify the five-year collective bargaining agreement.】

item.title: 美国移民突袭奥马哈肉类加工厂，裁员加剧食品生产担忧
item.description: 美国肉类生产商格伦谷食品公司总裁说，联邦特工在前一天的一次移民突袭中扣留了工人，导致该公司向杂货店和餐馆出售的产品产量减少，周三该公司在内布拉斯加州奥马哈市的一家工厂只剩下大约30%的员工。【原文：U.S. meat producer Glenn Valley Foods was operating an Omaha, Nebraska, facility with about 30% of its staff on Wednesday after federal agents detained workers in an immigration raid the previous day, slashing the output of products it sells to grocery stores and restaurants, the company's president said.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院形成多数派，要求社交媒体平台对用户发布的帖子负责
item.description: 巴西最高法院周三形成多数意见，要求社交媒体公司对用户在其平台上发布的某些类型的内容负责。【原文：Brazil's Supreme Court formed a majority on Wednesday to hold social media companies accountable for some types of content published by users on their platforms in the country.】

item.title: 交易日 好心情也会变坏
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 独家报道首席财务官：智利科德尔科公司将专注于公私合作伙伴关系，以促进融资和生产
item.description: 智利首席财务官亚历杭德罗-桑胡埃萨（Alejandro Sanhueza）周三对路透社表示，全球最大的铜生产商智利科德尔科公司（Codelco）将致力于建立更多的公私合作伙伴关系，以在努力提高产量的同时，增强财务状况并提高其开发新项目的能力。【原文：Chile's Codelco, the world's largest copper producer, will focus on more public-private partnerships to buoy finances and improve its capacity to develop new projects amid efforts to boost production, CFO Alejandro Sanhueza told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贝森特表示，90 天关税暂停期结束后，美国可能会对部分国家 "提前日期"。
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，如果标志着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）互惠关税90天暂停期结束的最后期限未达成任何协议，特朗普政府准备与贸易伙伴真诚谈判，"将日期提前"。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday said the Trump administration is prepared to "roll the date forward" with trading partners negotiating in good faith if the deadline marking the end of the 90-day pause on President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs is reached with no deal.】

item.title: 日本 JERA 同意购买美国液化天然气以重新平衡供应组合
item.description: 日本最大的发电公司 JERA 周四表示，该公司已同意从四个项目中获得美国液化天然气 (LNG) 的新供应协议，以实现其全球投资组合的多样化，摆脱对澳大利亚的依赖。【原文：JERA, Japan's biggest power generator, has agreed to new supply deals for U.S. liquefied natural gas (LNG) from four projects to diversify its global portfolio away from its reliance on Australia, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 甲骨文季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受部署人工智能的公司对其云产品需求增长的推动，甲骨文公司周三公布的第四季度营收超过预期。【原文：Oracle surpassed fourth-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday, boosted by growing demand for its cloud offerings from companies deploying artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 消息人士称，CoreWeave 将在谷歌与 OpenAI 的新云协议中提供计算能力
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，CoreWeave 在谷歌新近与 OpenAI 签订的合作伙伴关系中胜出，这是人工智能行业对计算资源的贪婪需求以及为满足需求而结成新联盟的最新例证。【原文：CoreWeave has emerged as a winner in Google's newly signed partnership with OpenAI, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters, in the latest example of the voracious appetite for computing resources in the artificial-intelligence industry and the formation of new alliances to meet them.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，巴里克矿业公司将马里黄金联合企业从 2025 年产量预测中剔除
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining）的四位消息人士告诉路透社，该公司已将其马里黄金联合企业从其 2025 年的总体产量预测中剔除，这加剧了该公司与旨在提高西非国家收入的新采矿立法之间长达两年的争议所造成的影响。【原文：Barrick Mining has removed its Mali gold complex from its overall output forecast for 2025, four sources told Reuters, adding to fallout from a two-year dispute over new mining legislation aimed at boosting the West African country's revenue.】

item.title: 消息人士称，阿波罗和 Irth Capital 提出了收购约翰老爹的要约
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士周三表示，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和伊思资本管理公司（Irth Capital Management）已与约翰爸爸国际公司（Papa John's International）接触，希望达成一项交易，将这家美国比萨连锁店私有化。【原文：Apollo Global Management and Irth Capital Management have approached Papa John's International for a deal that would take the U.S. pizza chain private, two people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌任命内部人士卡武克库奥卢领导人工智能产品开发工作
item.description: 根据路透社看到的首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）给公司领导人的一份备忘录，随着人工智能进入主流应用的新阶段，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周三任命了一位内部人士领导未来的人工智能产品开发。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Wednesday appointed an insider to lead its future AI-powered product development, as AI enters a new phase of mainstream adoption, according to a memo from CEO Sundar Pichai to company leaders seen by Reuters.】
